body.p: When you launch you are greeted with the Welcome dialog box. It is an informative and functional panel displayed when you start . It presents upcoming events, useful video demonstrations, helpful resources, the tip of the day and also gives you easy access to recently used files and projects and to create new ones.

If documents are already opened in the editing area at startup, this screen is displayed in a dialog box that appears in front of the main layout of . Otherwise, this screen is integrated in the empty editing area. To display it any time, go to Help Welcome . If you do not want it to be displayed every time you launch , disable the Show at startup option.
